name: Brakes Are Out: Funeral Dance
description:
Going full speed, brake! oops.. The brakes are out... (Funeral Dance Music Plays) #RIP

Try not to crash your car. Also some, well, all the other vehicles are dump they don't know how to drive. so don't mess with them or they will mess with your whole life. 

Travel as far as you can without crashing to earn score points.

ARTIFICIAL DUMPINESS
Everyone knows how to drive, well, not in this world. Artificial Dumpiness makes the game even harder with vehicles crashing and hitting you, you got to watch out.

ENDLESS
Dodge as many cars as you can while having no brakes to stop you

SPECIFICATIONS
Minimum Specifications
Processor: AMD Athlon X2 or Intel Core 2 Duo
GPU: AMD HD4200 or Intel G45
RAM: 1.5GB
DirectX: 9
OS: Windows 7 32 bit or Linux
HDD Space: 350MB

Recommended Specifications
Processor: AMD Phenom X4 or Intel Core i3 2125
GPU: Nvidia GT1030 or AMD Radeon HD 8950
RAM: 6GB 
DirectX: 11
OS: Windows 10 64 bit or Linux
HDD Space: 500MB
